medicine.name: Grumpirin
medicine.instructions: Take one every day with water.

medicine.name: Voodoo dust
medicine.instructions: Sprinkle on doorstep in pentagram pattern at dusk and dawn each day.

medicine.name: Holy water
medicine.instructions: Apply to affected area four times per day.

medicine.name: Stenchaway
medicine.instructions: Take one to two tablets when required.
